title: Understanding Save Functions
text: Unlike conventional file applications, Google Sheets doesn't have a dedicated save button. You manage your data and changes in a different way.

title: Navigating the Interface
text: Focus on actions you can perform within the Google Sheets interface to ensure your work isn't lost.

title: Input-Related Actions
text: Think about actions that involve modifying or adding information directly within your spreadsheet, which may automatically update your document.

hintAnswer: name or enter text in your spreadsheet
title: Identifying the Correct Approach
text: Google Sheets automatically saves any change you make as you enter text or data into your spreadsheet, so there's no need for a manual save function.
choices: drag it to a folder on Google Drive
select "Save as" from the File menu
name or enter text in your spreadsheet
